DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_META_ANUAL_V1
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT
 SUM(A.VALOR) VENDIDOS,
 (
 SELECT SUM(B.VALOR)
 FROM K_CRM_METAS B
 WHERE YEAR(B.DATA) = YEAR(GETDATE())
 ) META
FROM K_CRM_METASVENDAS A
WHERE YEAR(A.DATA) = YEAR(GETDATE())
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="VENDIDOS" From="A" Path="VENDIDOS" /> <Field Alias="META" From="A" Path="META" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
